mapper.select: select o.oid, o.bnum, o.mid, o.qty, o.orderdate,b.title, b.category, b.author, b.translator, b.publisher, b.ISBN, b.page, b.pubdate, b.price from bsorders o inner join bookstore b on o.bnum = b.bnum where o.mid = #{mid} order by o.oid desc
select b.title as title, b.price * o.qty as price from bsorders o inner join bookstore b on o.bnum = b.bnum order by price desc
select o.orderdate as orderdate, b.price price, o.qty qty from bsorders o inner join bookstore b on o.bnum = b.bnum order by price desc
